title: Formula Fusion
notes: Only runs with Steam launch option "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%". Some graphical glitches and the sound is distorted.
Game launches and is playable, but frame rate is extremely erratic and prone to stuttering. This does not seem to be related to graphical quality as all graphics presets perform similarly.
title: Formula Fusion

notes: Playable without many major issues apart from performance hit compared to running on Windows. There are audio playback/volume issues and in-game video billboards don't play properly, but I'm giving this a gold because said issues seem to be common in Unreal Engine games and can likely be fixed through winecfg or winetricks.
title: Formula Fusion

notes: Audio issues can be fixed by installing xact to the game prefix via winetricks (.../steamapps/compatdata/389670/pfx/). In-game videos do not display correctly, including the starting line countdown. There is also a strange bug that makes each race start at an extremely choppy frame rate that can only be fixed by going into the pause menu and changing the graphics quality preset to low then back to your preferred setting.
title: Formula Fusion
